import requests
import json

# 请求翻译
def translate(q):
    url = "https://fanyi.baidu.com/basetrans"
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8",
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3"
    }
    data = {
        "query": q,
        "from": "en",
        "to": "zh",
    }
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=data)
    result = json.loads(response.text)
    return result['trans'][0]['dst']

# 论文信息
title = "An algebraic approach to translating Japanese. (arXiv:2303.05834v1 [cs.CL])"
abstract = "We use Lambek's pregroups and the framework of compositional distributional models of language (\"DisCoCat\") to study translations from Japanese to English as pairs of functors. Adding decorations to pregroups we show how to handle word order changes between languages."

# 翻译
translated_title = translate(title)
translated_abstract = translate(abstract)

# 总结
tldr = "本研究采用Lambek预组合和语言的组合分布式模型DisCoCat框架作为方法，将日语到英语的翻译看作两个函子，通过为预组合添加修饰来处理语言之间的单词顺序变化。"

# 输出
result = {
    "translated_title": translated_title,
    "translated_abstract": translated_abstract,
    "tldr": tldr
}
print(json.dumps(result))
